brief_title: The Effects of Staggered Dosing on Interactions Between Paired Combinations of Nelfinavir, Ritonavir, and Saquinavir
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see if staggering doses of nelfinavir, ritonavir, and saquinavir has any effect on the interactions between these drugs.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must have: - Absence of HIV-1 infection as documented by any licensed ELISA test kit within 14 days prior to study entry. Exclusion Criteria Co-existing Condition: Patients with the following symptoms and conditions are excluded: - Any medical condition that, in the opinion of the investigator, would interfere with the patient's ability to participate in this protocol. Patients with the following prior conditions and symptoms are excluded: - History of chronic illness such as hypertension, coronary artery disease, arthritis, diabetes, or any chronic gastrointestinal conditions that might interfere with drug absorption.
